body:
Hi
So I cant log into my minecraft account on the launcher nor website.
Ive changed my password and I still cant login,
please help
body_tagged:
Hi
So I cant log into my minecraft account on the launcher nor website.
Ive changed my password and I still cant login,

title: Cant log on to my account

replies.body:
Have you tried migrating it, or checking if it has been migrated? Perhaps use your email rather than your username when logging in. Let me know if this works, will be researching more ways of how to fix it.


https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/359446-when-will-i-hear-back-
Several people are experiencing this issue, I found.

replies.body:
I had this about a month ago.
I literally tried changing my passwords and everything several times and nothing worked.
What did I do?
I waited til the next day, it worked then for some reason :P

replies.body: I also lived that, and solution is very eZ: Do not change your password, if you changed it, just enter your new password NEXT DAY. I don't know why but it fixes itself.
